type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Knight Noble
rules_text:
Flying
[i]Vidofnir[/i] – As long as its not your turn, tapped creatures you control have ward {2}.
[i]Pierce[/i] – Whenever Tana, Winged Queen attacks, tap up to one target creature you don't control. Tana gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that creatures toughness.
Partner with Innes, King and Strategician
